channel.title: Android on Panic! at the Kernel
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Panic! at the Kernel

item.title: Tags Denial-of-playback
item.description: In the past years I’ve encountered some FLAC files that for some reason refused to play on my Android devices. When I did try to play them, I was greeted by the following message: Sorry, the player does not support this type of audio file. Until recently I’ve accepted this to be a bug in Android / my music player app (PlayerPro which is awesome!). But I’ve decided to try and uncover what made those FLAC files “unsupported”, which turned out to be easier than I initially thought.
